sentence: More:Democratic U.S. Senate candidate Mandela Barnes opposes Biden administration's plan to lift Title 42 rule at the border More:Democratic U.S. Senate candidate Sarah Godlewski issues 'Cut Costs Plan,' calls for suspension of federal gas tax

title: Democratic U.S. Senate contender Alex Lasry vows to 'bring more jobs and investment back to rural Wisconsin'
